transcript: I'm embarrassing you. I didn't want to tell it to you here. I wanted a place where we'd never been before. A place where we'd be brand new to each other.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I'm embarrassing you and I didn't want to tell it to you here.  I wanted some place we'd never been before.  A place where we'd be brand new to each other.
